OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD LIFE LONG LEARNING

Desc.entry: Offers a range of groups and activities for older people across Sheffield, including history, literature, swimming. Most of the tutors are retired people themselves. Run by Age Concern, a registered charity.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times); courses held at various venues and times, please contact for details
